text:
Grant Opportunities
 Grant Opportunities 
The Silver State Insurance Exchange, Nevadas Affordable Care Act health insurance marketplace, is a state agency that oversees the online marketplace known as Nevada Health Link. As a state agency, the Exchange may contract with chosen vendors in the states best interests to allow for purchasing, renting, leasing, etc. of certain projects, technology, or materials. All vendors are given an equal opportunity to do business with the State through the Department of Administrations Purchasing Division.
Open Opportunities  Request for Applications (RFA)
RFA Opportunities are Closed
